Balthazar's Experiment

Balthazar's Experiment is a Companion Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Balthazar's Experiment is a part of the The Wizard of Waterdeep Companion Questline. Balthazar's Experiment can be acquired from Gale during the __part__ of the Act TBA. Completing Balthazar's Experiment will progress Gale story progression forward.
